name: Escape from the Abandoned Outpost
storyline: You've finished the Space Academy and are ready to conquer the stars! Just a year of internship at some outpost on the outskirts of the galaxy and you can start your life as a commercial pilot. The outpost is fully automated and in perfect condition, so what can possibly go wrong? Oh, wait....
summary: Escape from the Abandoned Outpost is a hidden object game, where the player's goal is to search the remains of the abandoned outpost and the surface of the hostile planet for resources, allowing them to repair the outpost and get back to civilization.
